title: Playing to Win
description: When Carter and Dan embark on a romantic weekend planned by Carter's step-sister Stacy, they get more than they bargained for. Stacy has designed a game to help Carter relax and have some fun, but the game quickly turns steamy as sibling rivalry entices Carter on a journey of first-time sexual experiences and forbidden pleasures.Carter is playing to win, but are the stakes too high?WARNING: This book contains explicit content including language and sexual situations which some may find offensive. This includes first-time oral and anal sex, first-time female only encounters, first-time bondage/pain play, unrelated family intimacy, and first time menage threesome. Meant for adults 18+ ONLY.
author: Kinley Grey
